Job position: Oferta de emprego: Full Stack Developer para Lagoa, Algarve.
Body: oferta de emprego: full stack developer para lagoa  algarve :cf lda  descrição do emprego  full stack developer para lagoa  algarve  » cf lda  » ref: 7114439  » 24-11-2020  » faro  » informática   programação    detalhe da oferta  a activbookings é um agregador de atividades turísticas  que atualmente conta com uma marketplace de atividades e experiências  um ecossistema de afiliados e um booking engine que foi criado com base nas necessidades dos operadores turísticos que precisavam de gerir e controlar as suas experiências e aceitar reservas online em tempo real   e é efetivamente essa a nossa missão  melhorar constantemente o nosso ecossistema de gestão e vendas dos nossos clientes de animação turística e marítimo turística com mais eficiência e com o objetivo de aumentar as suas reservas e receitas   acreditamos que conseguimos tornar a vida dos nossos clientes mais fácil e lucrativa  nós cuidamos da tecnologia para que os nossos operadores turísticos possam concentrar-se nos seus clientes e no que eles realmente adoram fazer: disfrutar das atividades de animação turística   referência da oferta: atualmente um full stack developer   referência da oferta licenciatura em informática ou similar  ou experiência significativa  paixão pelo conhecimento e pela inovação tecnológica  conhecimento tecnológico conhecimentos de framework django  conhecimentos elevados de python  conhecimentos de bootstrap e ajax  conhecimento e habilidade tecnológica para desenvolver soluções web inovadoras  gosto pelo mercado tecnológico e pela criação e desenvolvimento de produtos inovadores  referência da oferta experiência profissional de pelo menos 1 ano em funções similares  experiência de produção de código em ambiente web  ambição perfil dinâmico e proactivo  gosto pelo desenvolvimento do produto e do projecto  se corresponde aos requisitos apresentados por favor candidate-se através do e-mail: *** candidatura online ***  com a ref: o nosso cliente é uma empresa de desenvolvimento de software que procura reforçar a sua equipa com um full stack developer  m f  para o porto   principais responsabilidades  – desenvolvimento e manutenção da framework da empresa   – otimização dos processos já existentes na framework da empresa   – desenvolvimento e manutenção de aplicações e ou processos  com recurso à  framework da empresa  para os distribuidores e para os seus clientes finais   – apoio aos distribuidores da framework  nas implementações dos seus  clientes finais   requisitos  – formação superior em engenharia informática ou similar  mandatório    – experiência mínima comprovada de 3 anos em projetos de desenvolvimento de  software com recurso a linguagem de programação php e ou actionscrip   – conhecimentos em html  javascript e css assim como frameworks  simples como jquery   – conhecimentos em postgresql ou oracle   – experiência na gestão de servidores linux   – sólidos conhecimentos da língua inglesa   – gosto por trabalhar em equipa   – facilidade de relacionamento interpessoal  e de comunicação falada e escrita  nível de experiência assistente setor tecnologia da informação e serviços recursos humanos varejo tipo de emprego tempo integral funções de trabalho engenharia tecnologia da informação

Job position: Senior Full Stack Developer - Porto, Portugal
Body: senior full stack developer  microsoft c#  net   azure  asp net mvc  ci cd agile    trillium is a technical innovator delivering digital transformation for membership organisations  using solid design principles  continuous integration  continuous delivery and build automation  as well as jira and confluence tool   as a senior developer you will be responsible for technical development in a team and working closely with a technical analyst   you will be involved on intergations with microsoft dynamics 365 and 3rd party systems such a lms  learning managemnt system   the role will also involve code reviews and architectural overview as you'll be working across the full development lifecycle with a focus on backend development to deliver highly scalable and available systems   requirements you have a strong experience with the microsoft technology stack   net  c#   asp net  mvc api  you are familiar with solid design principles you have worked on highly distributed  real-time systems you are an advocate of agile scrum development you're familiar with unit testing  integration testing  you familiar with continuous integration   continuous delivery   build automation you have excellent communication and interpersonal skills   technical requirements  asp net mvc  model view controller   c#  content management system  umbraco – expert  sitecore – fundamental  rest apis  client-side web development technologies html – expert  css sass – expert  responsive design – expert  javascript – intermediate  jquery – expert  react   – fundamental  bootstrap – advanced  database application  sql – advanced nosql – advanced  microsoft azure  benefits a flexible benefits package you can tailor to suit you professional development accelerated career progression an environment that encourages entrepreneurial spirit  why work for trillium?  we hire mindsets  not just skillsets  we hire people because of how they think  not just what they do  ideas are actively encouraged and embraced from the very first day   we do great things for clients who do great things  our clients are organisations that serve people  not just bottom lines  they include membership bodies  chartered institutes and not-for-profit organisations  which assist their constituents with career development  fund-raising and support for essential causes  we help them enable technology to improve the quality of their services and generally make the world a better place   your passions are our passion  our office is a cultural melting pot  with people from at least a dozen nationalities  who all have amazing stories to share! personal interests are similarly diverse  whatever it is you're into outside of work  there is sure to be someone here who shares a similar interest in learning or participating   please note no agencies  nível de experiência pleno-sênior setor marketing e publicidade tecnologia da informação e serviços software tipo de emprego tempo integral funções de trabalho tecnologia da informação

Job position: Fullstack Developer - Jumia ODS ( Full Time)
Body: jumia is the leading pan-africa e-commerce platform  founded in 2012  jumia’s mission is to improve the quality of everyday life in africa by leveraging technology to deliver innovative  convenient and affordable online services to consumers  while helping businesses grow as they use our platform to reach and serve consumers   our platforms consist of our marketplace  which connects sellers with consumers  our logistics service  which enables the shipment and delivery of packages from sellers to consumers  and our payment service  which facilitates transactions among participants active on our platform in selected markets  through our online platforms  consumers can access a wide range of physical and digital goods and services  fashion  electronics  beauty products and also hotel and flight bookings or restaurant delivery   with over 3 000 employees in 14 countries spanning across 6 african regions  jumia is led by top talented leaders offering a great mix of local and international talents and is backed by very high-profile shareholders  jumia is committed to creating sustainable impact for africa  jumia offers unique opportunities in a vibrant and booming environment  creating new jobs  new skills  and empowering a new generation  we are looking for talented people with a passion for africa to join our team and embark on our exciting journey!  your work-life opportunity  the logistics team is responsible for improving time efficiency for our customers  riders  and partner stores  the team leverages machine learning  combinatorial mathematics  and operations research techniques to build services that make smart matching decisions and minimize the staleness of the fleet   in particular  you will work closely with a multidisciplinary team  developers  devops  qa engineers  product owners  oriented to continuous delivery work across the entire product life cycle: concept  design  development  deployment  testing  release  support write module  well-organized code  construct and verify  unit test  software components to meet design specifications take ownership for your code to be qualitatively high and you will support your colleagues in code reviews  integration of user-facing elements developed by front-end developers build efficient  testable  and reusable modules rapidly fix bugs and solve problems  requirements at least 3 years of previous working experience in web development  previous working knowledge with golang or php  node  and elasticsearch knowledge will be kindly welcomed  understanding fundamental design principles behind a scalable application user authentication and authorization between multiple systems  servers  and environments creating database schemas that represent and support business processes excellent communication skills and being able to work independently or in a full team proficient with mysql  experienced with web serverside and clientside technologies  working knowledge of symfony framework or similar  experienced with version control technologies  git   aware of performance and security topics on web development preferably previous commercial experience in web application development and   or software development  some knowledge of the linux command line   personal qualities & behavioural traits enthusiasm and an interest in all things technology  solution oriented and proactive attitude  likes problem analysis and solving  eager to work in team environment and share knowhow - easily adapts to new situations and changes  has a keen attention to detail and is organized   academic & trades qualifications higher education in it  software development  experience of the full software development life cycle: from requirements gathering and functional specification  to development  testing and delivery proficiency in english  both written and verbal   we offer a unique experience in an entrepreneurial  yet structured environment the opportunity to become part of a highly professional and dynamic team working around the world an unparalleled personal and professional growth as our longer-term objective is to train the next generation of leaders for our future internet ventures a second home where you will find opportunity for growth and career development  benefit list includes  but is not limited to  health insurance  parental bonus  snacks  fruits and bonuses based on your excellent results  nível de experiência assistente setor tecnologia da informação e serviços internet serviços financeiros tipo de emprego tempo integral funções de trabalho engenharia tecnologia da informação

what is slate?  slate is a web and mobile product used by some of the top brands in the world to create branded social media content in real-time  we have customers from the nfl  nba  mlb  mls  english premier league as well as some of the largest media organizations and brands in the world   we are a young company made up of a small  dedicated  team distributed across the globe  slate is backed by great investors including titletown tech  a joint venture of the green bay packers & microsoft  and wise ventures  associated with the minnesota vikings    we have been growing rapidly over the past year and have ambitious plans to grow both the company and product offering quickly  we have an exciting and extensive product roadmap of robust features and developments planned for both our web and mobile products  and this is where you fit in!  role description  we're looking for a full-stack developer focused on cloud  aws  and web development  the ideal candidate will be strong on both backend and frontend development   this individual will be comfortable working in a fast-paced environment without a lot of structure  we're particularly interested in an engineer with a passion for collaboration  quick iteration  and improving the skill sets of those they work alongside  the ideal candidate will also have ambitions to help lead an engineering team   for this role  you must be able to work autonomously  you must be proactive  and goal oriented  you will have the ability to balance business values  code quality and development pace   being a part of a small  focused team  you will be working closely with our co-founding team including our cto  based in bulgaria  as well our ceo   head of product  based in nyc  as well as other co-founders  engineers  and designers  this is an ideal role for an experienced engineer who is looking to join a passionate team and be part of the exciting start-up journey   responsibilities actively contribute to a small team of distributed engineers and designers working autonomously and developing features rapidly  design and build new features  simplify existing services  and help scale our systems as we rapidly grow and evolve  write sustainable  testable  high-quality  high-performance code  support and improve existing projects  knowledge of 2d graphics is a big plus  develop the great user experiences designed by our product team  identify opportunities for improvement wear multiple hats and jump between projects & tasks occasionally review peer code changes assist in designing infrastructure and architecture open to share knowledge with teammates and to help assist other teammates as needed    requirements: at least 4  years of back-end development experience with node    at least 2  years on aws services & sdk  at least 4  years of front-end development experience  ideal candidate with have 7  years of programming and development experience typescript 3 5  javascript node   aws: dynamodb  lambda  cognito  cloudformation  other aws services are a plus  design patterns architecture patterns is a plus proficient with angular 8   understanding of angular ecosystem  tools and libraries bootstrap 4  ngrx proficient understanding of html5  css 2  familiarity with commonly used typescript  javascript frameworks and libraries  previous experience helping lead a start-up dev team is a plus excellent communication skills ability to think effectively  critically and creatively fluency in english required   our culture: able to work and communicate positively and respectfully with others you're good at navigating and shaping the dynamics of a rapidly-growing company with a remote-first culture: quickly adapting when priorities change and making conscious trade-offs with incomplete information java developer:decskill - tecnologias de informação descrição do emprego: java developer id:  8938581  data   06-10-2020  empregador   decskill - tecnologias de informação  país da emprego   portugal  distrito   lisboa  categoria s    informática e tecnologias  intervalo salarial   informação exclusiva jobmatch  descrição do anúncio  decskill is 100% portuguese technological company  founded in 2014  and we currently have more than 200 employees  decskill operates in both national and international markets  with offices in lisbon  oporto and a coruña  capable to provide services to any location in the national territory   how can decskill be an accelerator to your career?  we currently operate in 3 major areas: outsourcing by decskill  augmented reality and computer vision products and solutions  by proskill  and agile training and coaching  by getskill   the success of decskill is built from the inside out  with talented employees and constant evolution  with innovative aspirations and a commitment to make a difference   we are looking for a java developer for lisbon   required skills  » 3  years of experience in unix linux systems   » good experience in ci cd tools and technologies and  in general  in “infrastructure as code” solutions   » experience with one or more of the following virtualisations  containerization and automation technologies: ansible  docker  kubernetes   etc    » 3   experience working as a full stack java developer  with excellent knowledge in software design and clean code principles  with knowledge of the main integrated development environments  preferable eclipse or intellij idea   » good experience in designing and implementing apis  e g   restful architectures  soap services    » good experience of java build tools  maven  gradle  etc     » good knowledge of one or more of the following data definition languages: xml xsd   on   if you’re interested in this job please send your curriculum vitae in english with the reference “jfo_java_mob"  nível de experiência assistente setor tecnologia da informação e serviços software recrutamento e seleção tipo de emprego tempo integral funções de trabalho engenharia tecnologia da informação

who we are  zühlke is an innovation company and helps corporates and start-ups to turn their idea into customer value and therefore market success  we develop financially successful products  services and business models for today’s digital world – from coming up with the initial idea through to the implementation and operation  we can achieve this by drawing on the experience of over 1000 in-house experts and of more than 10 000 successful projects   zühlke portugal is an attractive employer that offers challenging career opportunities for skilled  highly motivated software engineers  within the zühlke group  we position ourselves as a center of expertise for distributed  agile software development  together with colleagues in switzerland  germany  the uk  austria  serbia  bulgaria  singapore and hong kong we work on challenging software projects involving the latest technologies and variety of known practices   we are currently looking for highly motivated software engineers to join and build our team in porto   why zühlke work in an international client-based environment along with the leading experts in the industry family & wellbeing package - family health insurance  adjustable workload  80-100%  and flexible working hours personal development plan shaped to your needs unique opportunity to make an impact in the early phase of building up a new zühlke location clear career path and defined personal goals with achievement-based career prospects projects based in porto with opportunities to travel or working temporarily at other zühlke locations your talent  you should have a technical related degree and or equivalent professional qualification  communicative and openminded personality and be fluent in english  both written and oral    required skills strong technical skills in  net ecosystem good understanding of database systems basic understanding of web technologies solid understanding of oop concepts  design patterns and the ability to express concepts visually  e g  uml  c4  advantages experience with cloud platforms  aws  azure  experience in developing web applications using javascript frameworks  e g  angular  react  working in an agile team  with a good understanding of the concepts  practical experience experience with automated testing frameworks like nunit  specflow  selenium  jasmine or similar experience with configuring and using ci cd tools like azure devops  gitlab  jenkins  teamcity or similar  your role solving complex problems directly communicating with customers and guiding them towards success working closely with your local and remote colleagues in agile setup creating high-quality solutions while adapting to customer requirements being curious  open-minded  and standing by your ideas nível de experiência assistente setor tecnologia da informação e serviços software internet tipo de emprego tempo integral funções de trabalho engenharia tecnologia da informação

@ innovation & new technologies o departamento innovation & new technologies é reponsável pela investigação e implementação nos produtos primavera das tecnologiasstate-of-the-arte melhores práticas de desenvolvimento de software existentes  subdivide-se em 3 grandes áreas: framework de desenvolvimento web  microsserviços e user experience  se és um engenheiro que gosta de aprender todos os dias  esta é a equipa que procuras! o desafio que temos para ti  serás responsável por  integrar a equipaframeworkque  sendo feita à medida da primavera e com recurso às melhores tecnologias  eleva a agilidade  padronização e qualidade do desenvolvimento de produtos web  tornando-os diferenciados no mercado  desenvolver novas funcionalidades backend e frontend nesta framework  e realizar pontualmente manutenção às mesmas contribuir ativamente para a inovação e evolução deste produto  explorando e implementando continuamente novas tecnologias realizar code reviews técnicos  trabalhar em equipa com metodologia scrum o que procuramos formação superior em eng  informática ou equivalente experiencia mínima de 3 anos em funções de engenharia de software  com metodologias ágeis sólidos conhecimentos em c#  asp net   net core  sql server e angular  typescript  experiência em arquiteturas cloud  preferencialmente azure  forte capacidade analítica e de resolução de problemas inglês  leitura  primavera business software solutions a primavera é o resultado de uma ideia disruptiva e determinação contínua que  desde 1993  junta um ecossistema de 500 parceiros e mais de 40 mil clientes espalhados por cerca de 20 países  acreditamos na importância de simplificar a vida das organizações e das pessoas  mas não nos ficamos por aqui: deixamos a marca um pouco por todo o mundo  sempre com o foco na criação de valor e soluções inovadoras que respondem às exigências das empresas de todas as dimensões e setores de atividade  acreditamos que a tecnologia é o motor da gestão empresarial numa era digital cada vez mais exigente!  life at primavera ¤ o teubem-estaré a nossa prioridade e por isso preocupamo-nos com o work-life balance e em proporcionarmos experiências únicas ¤work hard  play harder!grandes conquistas e ainda maiores celebrações  sempre emequipa ¤ participação emprojetosdesafiantes e inovadores  com elevado impacto nosclientes ¤ acesso a oportunidades e experiências únicas deaprendizagem ¤ acreditamos emcarreirasde sucesso e proporcionamos um mapa detalhado para que possas construir à tua medida o teu próprio percurso  do itsimple  but make itcount! anunciada por gracie abery business operations manager at io-tahoe envie inmail front-end developer - node    react io-tahoe is seeking an experienced full-stack front-end user experience developer who can take design mock-ups and rapidly turn them into efficient working code using node    the react framework  and material-ui   our fast-growing automated data discovery firm works closely with organizations to help them understand  catalog  derive insights  and drive value from their business data using data science and machine learning techniques  the user experience developer is in a key position to help grow and make an impact in an exciting  growing market   if you have strong programming experience in node   and a keen eye for good design and user experience  we encourage you to apply  the successful applicant will be responsible for developing critical aspects of io-tahoe products  working with top notch user experience designers  this role is available as a permanent role with ample flexibility to work remotely from home   responsibilities you will work closely with fellow engineers  front end ux designers and developers  to deliver io-tahoe’s next generation platform  your responsibilities will include but are not limited to:   developing clean  efficient node   code using the react framework  material-ui  and other libraries for a web-based application   able to translate visual ux ui designs and wireframes into efficient runtime front-end code that delivers a high quality visual experience   develop front-end solutions on top of high-performance and distributed backend systems  use a code management system  git   issue trackers  jira   and a wiki for sharing and discussing ideas   build high quality reusable code and libraries and user facing component library & features  work closely with designers to deliver the best possible user experience  integration with data storage  mongodb via graphql   about you io-tahoe seeks a smart  creative  self-motivated  hands-on  and intellectually curious individual who can take and effectively turn ux requirements into production ready solutions   a degree in computer science  or relative applicable experience is desirable  you should have proven experience programming for front-end development  you should be comfortable and experienced working on software with a team  communicating ideas  and writing code that can be understood by others  you will be required to implement software at a high level of quality and take responsibility for the product and your contributions to it   you should also possess the ability to understand technical and advanced research material and transfer new ideas into code   additionally  you:  excellent  3  years  hands-on web application development skills using node   and react   are able to write clean  effective  well-commented code   have an appreciation for developing smooth seamless user navigation experiences with a keen attention to detail  including run-time error handling which delivers informative messages to the user   experience with graphql is a plus   must have fluent verbal and written english skills  and be able to occasionally travel as needed   benefits and perks io-tahoe offers a competitive compensation package and the opportunity to participate in developing unique data science and machine learning solutions in a rapidly expanding market category   we highly value continuing education and growth at io-tahoe  we fund employee’s efforts to achieve technical certifications with azure  aws  gcp  red hat  snowflake  and mongodb   about io-tahoe io-tahoe is a global leader in enterprise data automation  our patent driven data management solution automates data profiling  identification  classification  analytics  and relationship discovery across structured and unstructured data sources  significantly reducing the manual effort required for enterprise data users to better know  manage  and drive value from their data assets  in doing so io-tahoe enables enterprise customers to automate workflows including data and cloud migrations  data quality  data governance  and self-service data analytics  io-tahoe also provides an intuitive user experience designed to help technical and non-technical people collaborate  our team with a deep understanding of data challenges  giving us first-hand insight and appreciation into our customers’ diverse and complex data needs   #knowyourdata this role is based in the united kingdom or the ukraine and eligibility to work therein without visa sponsorship is a pre-requisite to be considered  no agencies please  direct applications only   io-tahoe is an inclusive equal employment opportunity employer that considers applicants without regard to gender  gender identity  sexual orientation  race  ethnicity  disabled or veteran status  or any other characteristic protected by law  nível de experiência não aplicável setor software tipo de emprego tempo description  who are we?  who is definedcrowd? well  from a technical point of view  we leverage the power of a global crowd to provide some of the world’s biggest companies with the high-quality data they need to power their artificial intelligence  we’re instrumental to the progression and development of artificial intelligence and we couldn’t be prouder or more inspired to be involved in an industry that is changing the world   from a personal point of view  we’re a group of big thinkers  high achievers and creative problem solvers  we bond over our shared love of software engineering  data science  and strong coffee  we like online gaming  running marathons  and team drinks  we celebrate authenticity and diversity and we’re invested in what we do  our mission? world domination  obviously!  what will you do?  you will select best options for software architecture based on engineering and business goals analyze trade-offs  recommend solutions and help move from ambiguity to clarity in early design phases work closely with partners in ux and ui design  marketing  product management and engineering to develop experiences for customer facing web properties turn design concepts into polished  accessible  cross-device  responsive experiences help establish standards within our client’s team for software and software processes quickly learn and use new tools and approaches where necessary    requirements  who are we looking for?  do you have the drive to work in an innovative and ambitious environment?  we’re looking for someone with a determined and proactive mindset  someone inspired and passionate to help us achieve our goals  our successful candidate is a strong critical thinker  reliable and transparent  with an ability to learn and communicate  we’re looking for someone special to contribute to our unique culture   our software engineers have bsc in computer science or related field at least of 3 years of experience with c# or java in the context of web development knowledge of html5  css  javascript  es6 and above   and at least one front-end framework  react  redux  knowledge of micro-service architectures knowledge of rest api's as well as sql and nosql databases ability to learn new things independently and develop quality software good communication skills   benefits  why join us?  here’s what we offer  you spend a lot of your time at work  so it should be challenging  fun and interesting  at definedcrowd  it will be all of those things and more  a unique culture  healthy working environment  and a flexible working schedule excellent career development opportunities in a high growth company access to an excellent compensation and benefits package an international and diverse team  representing more than 30  nationalities at our 4 locations global mobility and relocation support with the help of our specialized team continuous training opportunities leveraging hand-on workshops and formal development opportunities   about us  definedcrowd offers a platform with multiple data delivery options that leverages machine learning technology and human intelligence to deliver quality-guaranteed training data for ai systems  the platform offers self-service and fully customizable solutions that deliver high-quality project-specific training data  enabling ai products reach market quicker  it is this business model that has allowed definedcrowd to raise a total of $63 6m in funding over 4 rounds  our value proposition is quality  privacy  speed and scale  covering more than 50 different languages  with strong expertise in speech and natural language processing technologies  we have been serving ai companies and fortune 500 companies since day one  definedcrowd was founded in seattle and has offices in lisbon  porto and tokyo  nível de experiência assistente setor tecnologia da informação e serviços software internet tipo de emprego tempo integral funções de trabalho engenharia tecnologia da informação

distrito: porto - concelho: porto referência da oferta: talentseed referência da oferta: tempo inteiro referência da oferta: 7-4-2020 zona porto referência da oferta: informática   programação    referência da oferta  o seedsgroup é constituído por duas empresas: talentseed e itseeds  talentseed   empresa galardoada com prémio excelência rh em startups nos prémios rh2017  protocolada com a ordem dos psicólogos  que está a revolucionar o mercado de trabalho  permitindo às empresas acesso a plataformas e serviços online inovadores de gestão de talento  a itseeds é uma startup portuguesa com mentalidade global  especializada na criação de soluções customizadas na área de tecnologias e sistemas de informação  seja através de projectos de consultoria  outsourcing ou nearshore  temos uma vasta experiência na criação de plataformas tecnológicas inovadoras  somos uma equipa jovem  fun e com uma grande paixão pelo que fazemos! a inovação e apresentação de soluções tecnológicas são a nossa missão   a talentseed está neste momento a recrutar para  fullstack developer  m f  – porto  desafio o nosso cliente é uma empresa que conta com soluções de inteligência artificial e deep learning para ajudar os clientes a tornarem o seu negócio mais eficiente  atualmente encontra-se à procura de um fullstack developer para integrar a sua equipa   referência da oferta  o candidato ideal deverá possuir pelo menos 3 anos de experiência profissional em desenvolvimento de software e conhecimento aprofundado em javascript  para além disso  deverá possuir experiência em node    html  css e mongodb  experiência com python  react ou vue   e git serão valorizadas   candidate-se através do link: br  > nível de experiência assistente setor tecnologia da informação e serviços recrutamento e seleção recursos humanos tipo de emprego tempo integral funções de trabalho engenharia tecnologia da informação

tech lead  net portugal  we are seeking an experienced senior  net developer and technical lead to help us to initially establish and then evolve and grow our portugal based product development team in order to continue to dominate one of the most buoyant  fastest-growing industries  that is changing the world and the speed of which we receive items   lineten is on a mission to crack the code on urban delivery  by leading with our values and putting carrier partners first  we are paving the way for better delivery experiences  lineten is a new approach to delivery with a free carrier api and an operations management platform for shippers  we're building the first global data-driven last-mile network that has the potential to solve industry-wide problems   this is a remote position indefinitely but you must be based in porto  portugal   you will be joining a passionate  highly skilled  technical team of over 30  based in the uk  spain and portugal   who work on 3 core products  each with their own technical frameworks  using common front-end and back-end libraries  you will have gained experience of writing high quality and maintainable code throughout your career and be looking to take the next step into a leadership role  as well as setting the standards for the portugese software engineering team and mentoring junior members  you will also be responsible for liaising with the product and qa teams to build out the product vision   we are seeking a forward-thinking dynamic technical software engineer and leader  who wants to lead a game changing team and solve real-world business problems using cutting edge technology and thinking   as well as development through the full systems development life cycle  you will also be responsible for:  backlog grooming and work planning setting and following coding standards weekly sprint prioritisation  we have 2 weekly sprints  participate in daily stand-ups  sprint reviews past and current  weekly development meetings and 121's weekly solution design sessions participate in code reviews work with qa team to create test plans for new or modified functionality documentation using confluence and tasks using jira  atlassian software suite  participate in defining requirements  acceptance criteria early on with product owners troubleshooting production issues   experience:  seniority in  net core 3  experience in team lead and mentoring worked on developing architecturing a complex product end-to-end solid  tdd  ddd  bdd  microservices  headless cms  design patterns experience with frontend development  preferably vue  or similar   framework  knowledge of any other modern programming languages a plus  experience in integration with external rest apis outside the box thinking mentality and possibility to see the bigger picture  hands-on mentality good working knowledge of git and docker good communication skills  we need you to be comfortable with:  pair programming team work  knowledge sharing  training  guiding  helping new and existing team members  clear communication for expressing problems  blockers and any other matters automated software delivery pipelines  lineten is rapidly growing and we need ambitious  driven individuals to help us disrupt the logistics industry and take us to the next level  fast growth  means excellent career development opportunities for individuals who join us now   be part of something big  we're here to change things and want to make sure we develop our people along the way  nível de experiência júnior setor Job position: Full-Stack / Senior Software Engineer / Outsystems Crackerjack
Body: anunciada por mariana hostalacio 2° senior manager at s4 digital envie inmail in a world where great is no longer good enough  customers need partners to create technology solutions and build a sustainable competitive advantage  s4-digital is driving into the technology world  inspired and inspiring  creating strong teams along the way and building roads for the next journey  enjoying every ride is part of our dna  what about you? do you want to be a part of this journey? if so  join us!  what will you be doing? as a full-stack software engineer in the s4 digital outsystems cluster  you’ll be working with your team designing and developing solutions  mostly using outsystems platform  for multiple clients around the world  we also expect you to innovate and bring development best practices into your team while you keep looking at the upcoming technologies and frameworks  do you        feel that you are a javascript  c# and or outsystems expert?     enjoy challenging yourself to design systems that serves multiple clients?     like to deal with complexity and uncertainty?     enjoy taking on new challenges and stepping out of your comfort zone?     look for a place where you can constantly create collaboration opportunities?     wake up eager to brainstorm with other colleagues to solve the next challenge? tick all the boxes? you might just be the person were looking for  here is what you need to succeed in this job:  bachelors or master's degree in software engineering  computer science  or similar  if you do not have one but you have a solid understanding of computer science and software engineering fundamentals  we still want to hear from you  more than 4 years of javascript and c# experience or equivalent  proven experience with outsystems platform solid understanding of web architectures   experience with testing frameworks and methodologies   experience with react or typescript is a plus  passion to analyse and design elegant solutions for high-tech problems  experience in mentoring more junior software engineers  drive to innovate and bring development best practices into your team  drive to understand what are the upcoming technologies and frameworks  good communication skills and fluency in english  what we're offering:  excellent opportunity to work in an international group  dynamic work environment  free access to language classes and other training   still not sure you should apply?  more than creating solutions  we push and inspire our people to go further and deliver innovation anytime  anywhere   nível de experiência júnior setor tecnologia da informação e serviços tipo de emprego tempo integral funções de trabalho engenharia tecnologia da informação

job description  our frontend engineering team is looking for a senior ios developer to join our team in our office in coimbra  portugal   goodbarber has its own app builder mechanism  that's so  you won't just be working on an app  but the engine that will be used to create thousands of apps  you will collaborate closely with product  design and qa to spec  build  test and deploy new features   you will work under supervision on various sized projects  even if you are an ios expert  you will also have the possibility of working on different technologies  like android or angular  it will depends on your motivation to accept a new challenge in a different technology   our team is spread in this different offices ajaccio  corsica   france [hq] team size: 40 employees  departments: administration  product development  engineering  marketing  customer support  office location: coimbra  portugal team size: 5 - 9 employees departments: engineering office location: lisbon  portugal departments: customer support office location: new york city  usa departments: customer support office location: if you join our team  you will not just work with our team in coimbra  you will always be in constant communication with the rest of the team from our office in corsica  for that reason we do some regular trips to corsica  to be in touch with the rest of the team  also  during the time we work remotely from coimbra  we have daily meetings with all our team and keep in touch all the time   although  in coimbra you will join a community of other companies that is part of nest collective  you can find some of the events organized by this community here and here    here are some pictures of some of our office rooms in coimbra  feel free to visit us and say hi  missions & responsibilities craft new and improved features for the goodbarber engine analyze functional specifications  written by the functional project manager  and contribute to technical specifications  under the management of the technical lead  identification of the right technical solutions  definition of the technical architecture for given projects  within the general framework rapidly solve problems optimize the existing code for ease of use and performance prototype product concepts proactively look for ways to make the project better you’ll be part of the mobile team  to develop our core engine for ios motivation to learn new technologies what to find at goodbarber? job location: coimbra  portugal   fun  happy and politics-free work culture built on the principles of lean and self-organized be part of a international team work with a distributed team competitive salary full working desk: macbook pro  desktop monitor  among others covered parking spot  on parque horizonte  paid by company work in the downtown of coimbra 25 days of vacations regular trips to meet with our team in corsica  warning: risk of addiction to that beautiful island  joining the nest collective community  lots of fun with these guys  opportunity to learn and work in other frontend technologies work in our own product where our only stakeholders are in fact part of our team you don't have to manage our clients issues  you just have to focus on developing a high quality software  our support team will take care of our client issues   goodbarber is ranked as the 128th in the ft1000 europe’s fastest-growing companies  requirements 2y  of experience with ios sdk strong knowledge working with objective-c or swift experience with swift and auto layout strong experience consuming restful web services some published apps with relative success on the store keep updated with the most recent features of apple ecosystem strong oral and written english communication skills strong knowledge of git collaborative attitude when working with other team members strong problem solving skills backend and or full stack development experience is a plus experience in working on scrum methodology  if
